phrases: If you play it without feelin' it, it do not sound like no jazz to me!
Ri-chan, do you know the name of the tune he was playing on the piano?
Art Blakey and the Jazz Messengers' Moanin'.
My aunt's gone grocery shopping for dinner.
I have got one hour to make it or break it.
I thought I understood the distinctive features of jazz in my head,
but reproducing them was proving to be extremely difficult.
This guy do not get jazz one bit!
And he got no sense for it.
No matter what it takes, I am going to show him up!
I want to master this as soon as possible
and then perform it in front of him and Ri-chan!
You sure look like you are in a good mood.
What did I ever do to you?
It is my neck, is all.
These days, I got a crick in my neck that just will not quit,
an' it is puttin' me in the worst mood.
So I thought having a little fun like this would brighten my day.
W-What is that supposed to mean?
He is in the kendo team, so you would best not resist.
We can do better than that.
What do you say we pants'i am?!
Now there is a good idea.
Students from the girls' school come home this way too,
so this will give them a good show.
Hey, when this jerk wakes up,
tell'i am that no real man gangs up on a weakling...
What are you just standing there for?
I do not care how you do it, I want him eatin' dirt!
We going to play a game, like monkey in the middle?
Sentaro will take care of them,
Clearly, you boys are not used to scrappin'!
Ri-chan literally caught me with my pants down...
And on top of that, she rescued me...
Ri-chan, would you hold on to my glasses for me?
I think I will pay you back for knocking out my front tooth!
Now it is startin' to get interesting!
I-I am going to see to it that everyone in class gives you the cold shoulder!
You an' me are in the same class?
Those fingers of yours doing okay?
He is actually keeping an eye out for me...
Oh, you took another good pounding, huh?
Why is the squirt beat up, too?
Sen-boy, you been gettin' rowdy again?
Yeah, well, today was not much of a fight.
Well, it is good to see you are in fighting form.
Say, is he your brother, Ri-chan?
Brother Jun is from next door.
Now he is a university student in Tokyo...
Mind the store for just one tune.
Dad, you always say just one tune, but then you do not come up for two hours!
It is not every day that Junichi comes back to town... right?
Ri-chan, I am asking you, too.
Next time, I will treat you to a cream soda at our shop.
How about throwing in a cream puff?
Just make some noise, that is all!
What are you so jittery for?!
Do not sweat the details, just jump in!
So you have been playing jazz for just two weeks?
It was all over the place, but you got the mood.
You have played piano for a while?
How about coming over here from now on to practice?
He will come every day even without being told, right?
Well, I have to get to work.
Oh, that is right, Brother June
What is the name of that record you were going to tell me?
The two of us are alone.
Ri-chan, what do you usually do on your days off?
Oh, you mean with summer vacation coming up?
I was thinking maybe we could do our homework together?
I bet I could make real progress working on it with you, Kaoru-san.
Let us meet up there, behind the church.
Hold on, I will draw you a map.
Up until now, all my summer vacations have been spent alone in my room,
with far too much time on my hands...
I have so many things to look forward to
that I cannot wrap my head around it...
Looks like I am a little early...
This is how we are going to the library?
Or rather, why is he with us?
Does not it feel much better at the ocean?
Sentaro agreed this was the way to go, too!
Ri-chan... I meant for this to be a date...
How did it come to this?
Why did it end up the three of us?
Richie, give me a bite of that, wouldya?
Does not the rower get any kind of reward for his services?
Ri-chan, do you always have a cross on, too?
but it is not something you are supposed to wear around your neck.
Our priest says Sentaro is special, though...
You do not have to tell him all that.
For just a second there, the tension was thick enough to cut with a knife.
Or was it just in my head?
Kaoru-san, are not you going to swim?
We came all this way, so let us take a dip!
The thing is, I did not bring along a bathing suit.
He is just wearing his undies.
Ri'ko, hurry up and dive in!
What are you bein' bashful about?
You are flat as a washboard!
Last time we went swimmin', you had nothing but your slip on!
That is when we were in elementary school!
Do not say weird things like that in front of Kaoru-san!
It feels good, do not it?!
He really is a jerk, is not he?
Why do you keep swimming in circles?
This is the only way I know how to swim with my head out of the water.
Kaoru-san, you are a funny guy!
Why do I feel so happy when this girl smiles?
I feel like I could do anything for that smile...
Hey, you two look like you are having fun.
Oh, I only wish that we could keep going...
That I could take you away from here...
I will take over the rowing.
No, it is not about strength, but how you do it!
And I think I am getting the hang of it!
You took us to a completely different beach.
The sun is already setting anyway,
so if we tell the boat rental guy what happened, he will come by and pick it up.
Come on, girl, have a little fun with us.
We are not going to hurt ya!
We got a car, so let us take you for a ride!
So how about gettin' your mitts off her?
What, are you tryin' to be a hero?!
Hey, this dude is Kawabuchi from East High!
Th-This time, I will let you off the hook.
I did not realize what had just taken place...
